mapper.sql: PKID, CASE_CODE, CTM_CODE, CREATE_TIME, STATUS, CASE_PROPERTY, LEADING_PROCESS_ID, ORG_ID, CLOSE_TIME,loan_Req,CREATE_BY,CASE_ORIGIN,UPDATE_BY,UPDATE_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into sctrans.T_TO_CASE (PKID, CASE_CODE, CTM_CODE, CREATE_TIME, STATUS, CASE_PROPERTY, LEADING_PROCESS_ID, ORG_ID, CLOSE_TIME,UPDATE_TIME,CREATE_BY,UPDATE_BY) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctmCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{caseProperty,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{leadingProcessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{closeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},GETDATE(),@{SESSION_USER_ID},@{SESSION_USER_ID})

insert into sctrans.T_TO_CASE
PKID,
CASE_CODE,
CTM_CODE,
CREATE_TIME,
STATUS,
CASE_PROPERTY,
LEADING_PROCESS_ID,
ORG_ID,
DISTRICT_ID,
CLOSE_TIME,
CASE_ORIGIN,
CREATE_TIME,UPDATE_TIME,CREATE_BY,UPDATE_BY,
#{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ctmCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{status,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{caseProperty,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{leadingProcessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{districtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{closeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{caseOrigin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GETDATE(),GETDATE(),@{SESSION_USER_ID},@{SESSION_USER_ID},
mapper.update:
update sctrans.T_TO_CASE
CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTM_CODE = #{ctmCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
CASE_PROPERTY = #{caseProperty,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
LEADING_PROCESS_ID = #{leadingProcessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISTRICT_ID = #{districtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLOSE_TIME = #{closeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LOAN_REQ = #{loanReq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = GETDATE(), UPDATE_BY = @{SESSION_USER_ID},
CASE_ORIGIN = #{caseOrigin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select count(*) from sctrans.T_TO_LOAN_AGENT t with(nolock) where t.loan_srv_code='30004005' and t.CASE_CODE=#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT a.createTime, SUM (countJDS) AS countJDS FROM ( SELECT CONVERT (CHAR(7), CREATE_TIME, 120) AS createTime, COUNT (CASE_CODE) AS countJDS FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE WHERE datediff(YEAR, CREATE_TIME, getdate()) = 0 AND CASE_CODE IN ( ( SELECT CASE_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORG_ID IN #{item} ) UNION ( SELECT CASE_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORG_ID IN #{item} ) ) GROUP BY CONVERT (CHAR(7), CREATE_TIME, 120) UNION ALL SELECT CONVERT (CHAR(7), CREATE_TIME, 120) AS createTime, COUNT (CASE_CODE) AS countJDS FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE WHERE datediff(MONTH, Close_Time, getdate()) = 0 AND CASE_CODE IN ( SELECT CASE_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORG_ID IN #{item} ) GROUP BY CONVERT (CHAR(7), CREATE_TIME, 120) ) AS a GROUP BY a.createTime

SELECT a.CREATE_TIME createTime,SUM(countJDS) countJDS from ( SELECT convert(char(7) ,CREATE_TIME , 120) as CREATE_TIME, COUNT(CASE_CODE) as countJDS FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE where datediff(year,CREATE_TIME,getdate())=0 AND LEADING_PROCESS_ID IN #{item} GROUP BY convert(char(7) ,CREATE_TIME , 120)
UNION ALL
SELECT convert(char(7) ,CREATE_TIME , 120),COUNT(CASE_CODE) as countJDS FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE WHERE CASE_CODE IN((SELECT CASE_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TO_CLOSE WHERE PART_CODE is not null and datediff(year,CREATE_TIME,getdate())=0 ) ) AND LEADING_PROCESS_ID IN #{item} GROUP BY convert(char(7) ,CREATE_TIME , 120) )as a GROUP BY a.CREATE_TIME
mapper.update:
update sctrans.T_TO_CASE
CTM_CODE = #{ctmCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
CASE_PROPERTY = #{caseProperty,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
LEADING_PROCESS_ID = #{leadingProcessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLOSE_TIME = #{closeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LOAN_REQ = #{loanReq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME=GETDATE(), UPDATE_BY = @{SESSION_USER_ID},
where CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS id, ORG_NAME AS orgName FROM sctrans.SYS_ORG WHERE DEP_HIERARCHY = #{dep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select top 1 user_id,REAL_NAME,MOBILE,JOB_NAME,EMPLOYEE_CODE,ORG_NAME from sctrans.V_USER_ORG_JOB_ACTIVE u where ISMAIN = 1 and IS_DELETED=0 and USER_ID= #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT u.REAL_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE c LEFT JOIN sctrans.SYS_USER_ORG_JOB suoj ON c.ORG_ID = suoj.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN sctrans.SYS_USER u ON suoj.USER_ID = u.ID LEFT JOIN sctrans.SYS_JOB j ON suoj.JOB_ID = j.ID WHERE c.CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND j.JOB_CODE = 'Manager' AND j.IS_DELETED = 0 AND u.IS_DELETED = 0 AND suoj.IS_DELETED = 0;
